entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:23 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 0.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SSE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Fog. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 01:23 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating late in the morning then mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 01:23 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 01:23 AM PST Monday 09 January 2023
